text:
A fire occurred at a yarn company at Kamatchiammanpettai in Gudiyatham on Sunday morning.

According to officials, the fire and rescue services station, Gudiyatham received a call at 7.10 a.m. that a fire had occurred in the company.

A seven-member team rushed to the spot and put off the fire. It is suspected that short circuit was the cause of the accident.

However, information on the extent of damage was not known, they said. - Staff Reporter
title: Fire at yarn unit
